alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:36AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua, western Union, southern Columbia and southern Suwannee Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1136 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bell, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, High Springs, Fort White, Providence, Mcalpin, Luraville, Upland Pines and Lulu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
